name: Humanware Technology
description: Humanware Technology, offers a premier Human Resource Management System (HRMS) designed to transform HR operations from hire to retire. Our intelligent, user-centric software integrates AI, Chatbot, and RPA technologies, automating HR tasks to reduce costs and enhance efficiency. Humanware HRMS delivers business intelligence, analytics, and strategic insights, fostering a transparent and productive culture.
Headline: A Complete End to End HR Software ERP Solution for Any Business.
ShortDescription: HRMS Software to Unlock Your HR Potential

Highlights.name: Performance management
Highlights.description: 360 feedback, 9 box grid, OKRs and many more keeps team on track for success.

Highlights.name: BI & HR Analytics
Highlights.description: Data-driven approach with BI Powered HR Analytics for accurate and real time data.

Highlights.name: Travel & Expenses
Highlights.description: 100% configurable pay heads with smart OCR capture for Quick & Easy Approval.

enhanced_description: Humanware Technology offers a premier, intelligent, and user-centric Human Resource Management System (HRMS) designed to deliver a complete end-to-end HR software ERP solution for businesses, transforming HR operations from hire to retire. This powerful HRMS integrates advanced AI, Chatbot, and Robotic Process Automation (RPA) technologies to automate HR tasks, significantly reducing costs and enhancing overall efficiency. It delivers robust business intelligence, comprehensive analytics, and strategic insights, fostering a transparent and productive organizational culture. Key functionalities include advanced performance management tools like 360-degree feedback, 9-box grid, and OKRs, enabling data-driven HR analytics with real-time insights, and streamlining travel and expense management with 100% configurable pay heads and smart OCR capture for quick and easy approvals. The system also features an 'HR Metaverse', an 'Elegance user interface', and an 'Org-social tent' to enhance user experience and foster engagement.
key_use_cases: Automation of HR tasks to reduce costs and enhance efficiency
Strategic HR decision-making through business intelligence and analytics
Performance management and tracking for employee success (360 feedback, OKRs)
Streamlined travel and expense management with OCR and configurable pay heads
competitive_advantages: Integration of AI, Chatbot, and RPA technologies for automation
Org-social tent functionality to promote collaboration and culture
Comprehensive performance management tools (360 feedback, 9 box grid, OKRs)
Data-driven BI and real-time HR analytics capabilities
Smart OCR capture and 100% configurable pay heads for expense management
roi_benefits: Fostering a transparent and productive company culture
Team performance tracking and success enablement
Accurate and real-time HR data for informed decisions
Quick and easy approval processes for expenses
